Articles.Content:
This is simpile, create a space station, the size of the KSS will do, anything bigger or a tad smaller is good. Then, create any vechile, with railguns or missiles, then destroy the space station while its in orbit

rules:

any mods, even instant orbit( youll get docked 50 points though) accept cfg crap edits

100 points will be awarded with a space station less size then the KSS

150 points will be awarded for a SS the size of the KSS

200 points will be awarded for a bigger SS then the KSS

you will not be awarded the 200 points if you use the instant orbit however, only max 150 will be awarded if you use instant orbiter

1.

2.

3.

Oh and first person to get me a video of it gets an extra 100 points, instant orbit or not
The new multiple object sim is making people go nuts with these challenges, but it\'s interesting. This is kinda like orbital trap shoot! ;P
